title: ponnoLir mEni
sahitya:
ponnoLir mEni koNDAn paripUraNa jnAni avan puruSOttaman


anupallavi

  cinmayat-tI shuDar enna mahA shakti divya kuNDali shen kadir vIsiDum


caraNam    uLLum puramum uyirum karaNamum OmkAra jyOtiyai nIngAdu pErinba
veLLam pOl vAzhbavan vEda vaDivAna vittagan shuddha samatva siddhAntanAm
